It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

Module faq

How can I invest with usd.capital ?

Sign up for free, login on account. Make a deposit and get daily profit for 75 days.

Which payment systems are you accept?

Bitcoin www.blockchain.com

Perfect Money www.perfectmoney.com

How long does it take for my deposit to be added to my account?

Your account will be updated automatically, as we get your deposit.

If I forgot my password, what should i do?

Click forgot password button, and make all actions for password recovery.

How can I withdraw funds?

Check you cabin on withdraw area. Send a request for withdrawal and get your money.

I made a withdrawal request: when will i get my money on the wallet?

You will get it during 48 hours. Usually much faster.

Do you have a affiliate program?

Yes, you can get 7% from all deposits of your referrals.

You can get your invite link on account area.

Can I lose money?

Please read the Rules of our platform. There is a risks in trading, but we have a professional team and diversified strategy. So there is no risks to loose all your money.
